DOC.HEADLINE: WEST VENTURA COUNTY FOCUS : OXNARD ; POLICE RELEASE DETAILS IN SHOOTING DEATH
DOC.TEXT: An Oxnard man who was shot at a friend ' s house was killed by a shot fired through the kitchen window , Oxnard police_detectives announced Monday . But no suspect or motive has been identified in the slaying of Ricardo Gonzales , 38 , police said . Gonzales was visiting friends in the 200 block of Clara Street when he was shot Friday evening . Investigators on Monday said evidence suggests that the killer was standing outside the house and fired through a kitchen window , hitting Gonzales in the upper torso . Police had no information on whether Gonzales was the intended target of the bullet . PEGGY Y . LEE
